metadata.name: [focused] His vitals look steady for now, but

snippets.text: [focused] His vitals look steady for now, but I don’t like the direction of these labs at all. The white count is climbing, and that usually means something is brewing under the surface.
[thoughtful] Exactly, and when I listened to his lungs, there was a hint of congestion. It’s subtle, but paired with the labs, it makes me hesitant to rush straight to antibiotics.
[energized][confident] Alright, I checked his old echo, and there was mild dysfunction noted last year. Combined with today’s findings, it fits better than an acute infection.
[decisive] Yes, and I want to confirm something in his previous imaging before we move. Give me a moment, I’ll be right back
